ca.eandb.jmist.framework.color.xyz.single

Class SingleXYZColorModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.eandb.jmist.framework.color.ColorModel
      • ca.eandb.jmist.framework.color.xyz.single.SingleXYZColorModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public final class SingleXYZColorModel
extends ColorModel
    A ColorModel that maintains a single (wavelength, value) pair to represent all three XYZ channels while tracing a path.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • sample

        public Color sample(Random random)
        Description copied from class: ColorModel
        Creates a random sample based on the spectral sensitivity of an observer as represented by this ColorModel. This represents the source of importance for illumination algorithms.
        Specified by:
        sample in class ColorModel
        Parameters:
        random - The Random number generator to use.
        Returns:
        The Color sample.
